item.title: Bangalore to Makalidurga Trek: One-Day Trekking Guide for Couples, Friends, and Families
item.description: Makalidurga is one of the most rewarding and beginner-friendly trekking destinations near Bangalore. Located just 60 km from the city, this beautiful hill offers a perfect one-day getaway for bikers, couples, families, and anyone looking to experience nature without venturing too far. With its ancient hill fort, scenic Gundamagere Lake, railway track crossing, and monsoon greenery, Makalidurga is
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
